```js
var api = google.maps,
    mapCenter = new api.LatLng(50.91710, -1.40419), 
    mapOptions = {
        zoom: 13,
        center: mapCenter,
        mapTypeId: api.MapTypeId.ROADMAP,
        disableDefaultUI: true
    },
    map = new api.Map(document.getElementById("map"), mapOptions),
    ui = $("#ui"),
    clicks = 0,
    positions = [];
```
